title: Hired Muscle
text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put a ki counter on Hired Muscle.At the beginning of the end step, if there are two or more ki counters on Hired Muscle, you may flip it.----ScarmakerLegendary Creature — Spirit4/4Remove a ki counter from Scarmaker: Target creature gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
